# your code goes here
t=int(raw_input())
for ii in range(t):
	a,b=map(int,raw_input().split())
	p=0
	q=0
	while a>0 and b>0:
		p=p*10+(a%10)
		a/=10
		q=q*10+(b%10)
		b/=10
	
	while a>0:
		p=p*10+(a%10)
		a/=10
		
	while b>0:
		q=q*10+(b%10)
		b/=10
	
	#print p,q
	ans=p+q
	l=0
	while ans>0:
		l=l*10+(ans%10)
		ans/=10
	print l
